com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit

Class IsdaCdsPricer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.credit.IsdaCdsPricer

  • public class IsdaCdsPricer
extends Object
    Pricer for for CDS products using the ISDA methodology.

    This function provides the ability to price a ResolvedCds. Both single name and index swaps can be priced.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IsdaCdsPricer DEFAULT
      Default implementation

    • Method Detail

      • presentValue

        public CurrencyAmount presentValue(ResolvedCds product,
                                   NodalCurve yieldCurve,
                                   NodalCurve creditCurve,
                                   LocalDate valuationDate,
                                   double recoveryRate,
                                   double scalingFactor)
        Calculates the present value of the expanded CDS product.

        The present value of the CDS is the present value of all cashflows as of the valuation date.

        Parameters:
        product - expanded CDS product
        yieldCurve - calibrated curve points of the ISDA discount curve to use
        creditCurve - calibrated curve points of the ISDA spread curve to use
        valuationDate - date to use when calibrating curves and calculating the result
        recoveryRate - recovery rate associate with underlying issue or index
        scalingFactor - linear scaling factor associated with underlying index, or 1 in case of CDS
        Returns:
        present value of fee leg and any up front fee

      • presentValue

        public CurrencyAmount presentValue(ResolvedCds product,
                                   IsdaYieldCurveInputs yieldCurveInputs,
                                   IsdaCreditCurveInputs creditCurveInputs,
                                   LocalDate valuationDate,
                                   double recoveryRate,
                                   double scalingFactor)
        Calculates the present value of the expanded CDS product.

        The present value of the CDS is the present value of all cashflows as of the valuation date.

        Parameters:
        product - expanded CDS product
        yieldCurveInputs - par rate curve points of the ISDA discount curve to use
        creditCurveInputs - par spread rate curve points of the ISDA spread curve to use
        valuationDate - date to use when calibrating curves and calculating the result
        recoveryRate - recovery rate associate with underlying issue or index
        scalingFactor - linear scaling factor associated with underlying index, or 1 in case of CDS
        Returns:
        present value of fee leg and any up front fee

      • parRate

        public double parRate(ResolvedCds product,
                      IsdaYieldCurveInputs yieldCurveInputs,
                      IsdaCreditCurveInputs creditCurveInputs,
                      LocalDate valuationDate,
                      double recoveryRate)
        Calculates the par rate of the expanded CDS product.

        The par rate of the CDS is the coupon rate that will make present value of all cashflows equal zero as of the valuation date.

        Parameters:
        product - expanded CDS product
        yieldCurveInputs - par rate curve points of the ISDA discount curve to use
        creditCurveInputs - par spread rate curve points of the ISDA spread curve to use
        valuationDate - date to use when calibrating curves and calculating the result
        recoveryRate - recovery rate associate with underlying issue or index
        Returns:
        par rate for the credit default swap
